author: @stepansmirnov5876
text: I made it! I implemented regression yourself without watching next video. But my implementation works only with unpreprocessed X's and I didn't implement score method. You can run it. Just chsange clf = MylinearRegression() and comment line X = preprocessing.scale(X) class MyLinearRegression:     def fit(self, X, y, col = 0):         x = X[:, col]         x_ = x.mean()         y_ = y.mean()         self.m = (x_*y_ - (x*y).mean())/(x_**2 - (x**2).mean())         self.b = (y_ - x_*self.m)      def score(self, X, y):         return 1          def func(self, x):         return self.m*x+self.b              def predict(self, x, col=0):         return np.array(list(map(self.func, x[:, col])))
